Html:
Warning 1 Load of property 'RootNamespace' failed.  The string for the root namespace must be a valid identifier. Tutorial1 - Getting Started

 

Goblinxna.dll missing

If you follow the installation guidelines properly you may come across instruction to compile GoblinXNA dll file at the second last paragraph. Have you done that? Remember, I was hit with the same problem before. I was using C# 2010 Express & XNA 4. It should be compiled with 2008 Express & XNA 3.1.
